definition: Distance to event features counters indicating how many periods (candles) have passed since the last occurrence of certain events, in the context of the episode.

paragraphs.text: How the Distance To Event Works

The information may be used from within strategies, for example, to leave a cool-down period in-between positions, to separate orders in specific intervals, or to achieve any particular logic that may require counting how much time has passed since the last time a specific event was triggered.
To add the distance to event node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
